title: Liturgy Wars - Julian hosts a global Catholic conversation with Carlos M, Andreas, and Pedro
description: Julian talks with Catholics Carlos M from the Philippines, Andreas from Germany, and Pedro from Portugal about current views of Catholic liturgy and the Church's approach to the world, and particularly to those who find themselves immersed and operating quite naturally in a culture foreign to the Catholic tradition.
